name: Terracon
overview: The evil Terracon is mercilessly wiping out the galaxy, planet by planet. As Xed, the toughest little alien ever hatched, you have to face the Terracon Terror in the greatest adventure in the galaxy. • Over 35 huge levels of action, exploration and puzzle solving. • Fly an interplanetary dropship! Cruise alien waters! Seize control of Terracon gun emplacements! • Collect "Genergy" to create vehicles, machines, structures and awesome weapons. • Take on the might of the Terracon's many different forces. • See the Universe through alien's eyes.
